query:
SELECT p.rawAreaText, h.name as hospitalName 
FROM purchases p 
JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id 
WHERE p.rawAreaText IS NOT NULL AND p.rawAreaText != '' AND p.areaId IS NULL 
ORDER BY h.name, p.rawAreaText 
LIMIT 80
